title: The Collected Christopher Connery
description: Private investigator Gail Lin thought she’d seen the end of magician crime lord Christopher Connery. Torn to bloody pieces, Connery seemed to be out of her hair for good. Unfortunately, the city of Crossbridge’s Academy of Magicians has other plans. In order to make use of Connery’s brilliant magical innovations, the Academy plans to put Connery together again.  But first, they have to find him.  Hired to gather the pieces of Connery’s body, Gail joins forces with Nia Graves, a brilliant but inexperienced Academy magician. As their task swiftly proves more dangerous than anticipated, they struggle to survive Connery’s posthumous tricks and their own troubling memories.
author: L. EE
